    • Method Detail

      • getUserTasks

        public static Datacollection getUserTasks(Context paramContext,
                                          java.util.List<Selectable> paramList,
                                          java.lang.String paramString,
                                          boolean showProjectTasks,
                                          java.lang.String strType,
                                          java.lang.String strCompleteDays)
                                   throws FoundationException
        Parameters:
        paramContext - the enovia context object
        paramList - List of object Selectables
        paramString - owned - to get owned tasks; assigned to get assigned tasks
        showProjectTasks - boolean true to fetch Project tasks
        strType - Type of tasks to return
        strCompleteDays - duration in days
        Returns:
        the collection of all the tasks for which the context user is the owner or is assigned to the task the method is used to get the Tasks for the context user based upon the selectable list
        Throws:
        FoundationException - when operation fails

      • getUserRouteInboxTasks

        public static Datacollection getUserRouteInboxTasks(Context paramContext,
                                                    java.util.List<Selectable> paramList,
                                                    java.lang.String paramString,
                                                    java.lang.String strCompleteDays)
                                             throws FoundationException
        Parameters:
        paramContext - the enovia context object
        paramList - object selectable
        paramString - owned to get owned tasks, assigned to get assigned tasks
        strCompleteDays - duration of completion
        Returns:
        the collection of all the tasks for which the context user is the owner or is assigned to the task the method is used to get the Tasks for the context user based upon the selectable list
        Throws:
        FoundationException - when operation fails
